mapper.insert: insert into mkt_cam_strategy_rel (CAMP_STR_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, STRATEGY_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID) values (#{campStrRelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{strategyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lanId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.select: select CAMP_STR_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, STRATEGY_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID from mkt_cam_strategy_rel where CAMP_STR_REL_ID = #{campStrRelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
